high_descs: Turn right and walk forward, then hang a right and walk up to the wooden desk.
Pick up the closest wooden bowl off of the wooden desk.
Turn right and walk towards the bed, then turn left to face the small lamp on the desk.
Turn on the light of the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a wooden bowl in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the desk in front of you.
Pick up the bowl nearest to you on the desk.
Turn right and go to the bed, then turn left to face the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl in the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right, move a couple steps forward, then head right to stand behind the office chair, facing the desk.
Pick up the bowl from the desk that's closest to the chair.
Carry the desk a few steps to your right to stand at the end of the desk, which is next to a plant.
Turn on the lamp on the corner of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl using the light from the lamp on the desk.
